casebody.data:
Before McCarthy and O’Dwyer, JJ.

Robert Loughran, Respondent, v. The Continental Hygela Ice Company, Appellant. Appeal from a judgment . entered upon a verdict in favor of the plaintiff and from an order denying a motion for a new trial. J. N. Kahn, for appellant; Little & McCabe, for respondent.

Judgment and order appealed from affirmed, with costs. No opinion.
